name: com.reachcloud.metaverse-cloud-sdk
description:
The Unity SDK for the Metaverse Cloud Engine



# Changelog

## 2.199.3
- Fix null reference handling for BlockchainAssets and BlockchainCategories in AssetEditor

Updated on October 09, 2025

## 2.199.2
- Update MetaverseCloudEngine.ApiClient.dll and MetaverseCloudEngine.Common.dll binaries

Updated on October 09, 2025

## 2.199.1
- Refactor device ID storage handling for Unity Editor compatibility

Updated on October 09, 2025

## 2.199.0
- Add UnityDeviceIdProvider for device ID management and refactor unauthorized upload handling

Updated on October 09, 2025

## 2.198.54
- Enhance upload process with estimated time and upload speed persistence

Updated on October 08, 2025

## 2.198.53
- Fix logging format and add WebGL compatibility for Jint script evaluation

Updated on October 07, 2025

## 2.198.52
- Enhance WebGL support by executing raw scripts and skipping caching for prepared scripts

Updated on October 07, 2025

## 2.198.51
- Refactor initialization logic in MetaverseScript to improve error handling and maintainability

Updated on October 07, 2025

## 2.198.50
- Ensure WebGL is always compiled last in the asset bundle build process

Updated on October 06, 2025

## 2.198.49
- Add GetComponentsInChildrenOrderedOfType methods for GameObject and Component

Updated on October 02, 2025
